subject: ANT Can't find Tools.jar
msgSnippet: Sorry for posting this question here, but I am trying to run ant at home so I can get a junit report and I can t get it to run. I am getting the following
messageBody:
Sorry for posting this question here, but I am trying to run ant at
home so I can get a junit report and I can't get it to run. I am
getting the following message:

Unable to locate tools.jar. Expected to find it in C:\Program
Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\lib\tools.jar

I have JDK1.4 installed on my c: drive. I have JAVA_HOME pointing to
it and I tried putting the tools.jar on my classpath environment
variable. I don't know why it is looking down in C:\Program Files\Java
or if it just went searching on its own why it didn't pick up either
the 1.4 or 1.5 JDK directories that are in that directory.

Has anyone had a problem with this or have any ideas what I should try
next? I already checked the bug reports on the Apache web site and
couldn't anything like this.
